mocap.settings.info.name: §l名称：§r %s
mocap.settings.info.about.track_vehicle_: Enables tracking (recording) of vehicle entities (like boats or horses)
mocap.settings.info.about.track_projecti: Enables tracking (recording) of projectiles (like arrows or snowballs)
mocap.settings.info.about.track_other_en: Enables tracking (recording) of entities other than vehicles and items
mocap.settings.info.about.prevent_tracki: Prevents tracking (recording) entities that are currently played
mocap.settings.info.about.entity_trackin: Limits the entity tracking distance (>0 - tracking radius in blocks; 0 - disable tracking; -1 - distance not limited)
mocap.settings.info.about.record_player_: Enables recording player death and stops recording at that moment
mocap.settings.info.about.recording_sync: 通过将播放中场景的开始与录像的开始同步，来让复杂场景的录制变得更加容易
mocap.settings.info.about.playback_speed: 允许你更改播放录像或场景的速度
mocap.settings.info.about.play_vehicle_e: Enables playback of vehicle entities (like boats or horses)
mocap.settings.info.about.play_projectil: Enables playback of projectiles (like arrows or snowballs)
mocap.settings.info.about.play_other_ent: Enables playback of entities other than vehicles and items
mocap.settings.info.about.can_push_entit: Makes fake players push other entities
mocap.settings.info.about.entities_after: Determines what will happen with entities after playback (-1 - release it as a normal entity; 0 - left untouched; 1 - remove; 2 - kill with animation)
mocap.settings.info.about.block_actions_: Plays back placing, destroying, and interacting with blocks
mocap.settings.info.about.block_initiali: At the playback start sets block states to those before the start of recording
mocap.settings.info.about.drop_from_bloc: Enables drop from destroyed blocks (recommended with "playItemEntities" disabled to prevent duplicates)
mocap.settings.info.about.fluent_movemen: Sets distance to played entity for player to receive additional packets for more fluent movements (>0 - distance in blocks; 0 - disable fluent movements; -1 - no limit)
mocap.settings.info.about.movement_preci: Sets precision of recording player movement - absolute value of difference between desired position offset and calculated offset won't be higher than 1/val
mocap.settings.info.about.precise_rotati: Increases played head rotation precision (recordings also need to be recorded with higher precision for it to make take affect)
mocap.settings.info.about.allow_mineskin: Allows HTTPS requests to mineskin.org in order to load skins
mocap.settings.info.about.prevent_saving: Prevents game from saving played entities in case of for example leaving game
mocap.settings.info.about.use_creative_g: Sets fake players game mode to creative (monsters will ignore them)
mocap.settings.info.about.allow_ghosts: Allows usage of ghosts (invisible, server-side only players) when using "player_as_entity" modifier. They're created in order to perform actions that can't be done by a non-player entity.
mocap.settings.info.about.experimental_r: Warns players when a server is using experimental (alpha or beta) release of Motion Capture mod.
mocap.settings.set.invalid_value: Value you're trying to change to is invalid!
mocap.help:
%s - §lHelp§r
  /mocap recording [...] - Recording player movements
  /mocap recordings [...] - Managing recording files
  /mocap scenes [...] - Creating and modifying scenes
  /mocap playback [...] - Playback of scenes and recordings
  /mocap settings [...] - Shows and modifies settings
  /mocap info - Displays information about mod
  /mocap help - Displays this message
§lHow to use:§r
- First, you need to start recording using "/mocap recording start". It will record all your movements or movements of a player given as an argument. 
- Then, you can stop recording using "/mocap recording stop" and save it with "/mocap recording save <name>".
- Use "/mocap playback start <name>" to play recording.
- You can also create scenes to which you can add multiple recordings or other scenes, with parameters like player name, position offset, or start delay.
- To create scene use "/mocap scenes add <scene_name>". Then, add your recording using "/mocap scenes add_to <scene_name> <recording_name> [delay] [x_offset] [y_offset] [z_offset] [player_name] [skin_source_type] [skin_source]" (you can skip arguments in square brackets if you want).
- To play scene use "/mocap playback start .<scene_name>" - you need to put a dot before the scene name.
- By putting a dot before name, when using "/mocap scenes add_to ...", you can also add scenes to other scenes.
mocap.file.info.name: §lName:§r %s
mocap.failure.improper_filename.characte: 你只能使用小写字母、数字、下划线、短划线或点
mocap.failure.improper_filename.dot_firs: 不能使用点作为第一个字符

mocap.warning.custom_skin_cache_limit.ti: Rejoin the world to clear it
mocap.error.failed_to_load_scene.not_sup: 不支持的场景文件版本
